## Bio

Dean Marchiori is an expert in statistical modelling and advanced data analytics. With formal training
as a university medal winning mathematician, he specialises in time series analysis, anomaly detection, geospatial analysis and the R programming language. Dean currently leads the data analytics team for Endeavour Energy where his work focuses on modelling bushfire and vegetation risk on the electricity network. In 2019, Dean was named one of the top 10 analytics leaders in Australia by the Institute of Analytics Professionals of Australia. He is also recognised as an Accredited Statistician with the Statistical Society of Australia.
